channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Persona Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2293|2024-08-04T07:01:41.212Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20persona%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Persona Plugin 2.4 and earlier allows users with Overall/Read permission to read arbitrary files on the Jenkins controller.
